data.description:
AUTODESK WORKSHOP XR LICENSE REQUIRED FOR USE. To learn more, request a free trial, or sign up for the waitlist to be informed when Autodesk Workshop XR is available for you, visit workshopxr.autodesk.com. 
__

Autodesk Workshop XR is an immersive workspace, connected to Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC), where AEC teams can review and collaborate in their 3D models to track issues, catch errors, and enable better spatial understanding. 

With automatically connected data, no-prep model streaming, and synced issue tracking, Workshop XR makes design reviews frictionless and efficient.  

**Current Features**
- Load Revit or Navisworks Models from Autodesk Construction Cloud (ACC) into VR  
- Meet in a collaborative workshop with team members
- Review your model with your team at 1:1 or dollhouse scale
- Access supported ACC data like Files and Issues 
- Create and manage issues 
 
Autodesk Workshop XR is compatible with Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, and Meta Quest Pro.  
__  

FOR LICENSED USERS ONLY (Visit workshopxr.autodesk.com to learn more and request a free trial.)

changelog.change_log:
Updates:
- (NEW) Persistent Measurements: You can now identify the spatial distance between endpoints. Measurements are automatically visible to other users.
- Easier Issue Creation: Create issues more intuitively and with fewer clicks.
- Improved model load times and switching between 1:1 and workshop.

What’s Fixed:
- Fixed an issue that could cause some users to lose the ability to control visibility via the Model Tab.
- Fixed several bugs that resulted in app crashes.

Known Issues and Workarounds:
- Users may intermittently lose the ability to go to or gather specific users due to a known issue with certain permission roles.
- Button to open/close and reposition the console may lose functionality if the user goes to the Home space and then returns to a Workshop. To resolve this, exit the app and re-enter it.
- Some users with lower permissions may not see measurements created by those with higher permission levels.
- Users may hang in blank space for an extended time when exiting the workshop after working with large data sets.

New:
- Added a blue overlay tint to indicate geometry that is still loading
Fixes
- Resolved a crash when user leaves workshop
- Bug fixes and improvements

Bug Fixes:
- Resolved an issue causing the application to crash when the headset is put to sleep while the voice-to-text feature is still active

Improvements:
- Optimized device memory usage to prevent crashes from deleted tiles.

Bug Fixes:
- Resolved an issue causing the application to crash while navigating back to the Home Screen or when switching to the Workshop and loading a model.
- Fixed a crash that occurred when loading SVF2 models with malformed model bounds.
- Addressed sporadic crashes experienced during the loading or unloading of avatars.

Updates
- Added base color material to all mid-level geometry, removing the gray render.
- Added ability to search and filter files.
- Improved initial model position when sharing a model in your Workshop.
- Enhanced geometry loading indicator for better feedback.
- Improved functionality for selecting specific 3D views in Workshops.

What’s Fixed
- Creating a Workshop
  - Resolved issue causing workshop duplication after a failure in VR-home.

- Avatars
  - Fixed lip-sync and facial expressions for reflection avatar in home space.

- Model Loading
  - Ensured persistent connection with uploaded models between sessions for newly created workshops.
  - Fixed issues with incorrect material assignment during geometry loading.
  - Corrected model visibility on the workshop table after creation.

- Interacting with Model
  - Objects now correctly highlight when selected.
  - Fixed rotation issue when aiming at teleportation spots.
  - Improved collision handling with invisible geometry if model is scaled beyond table bounds.

- Model Visibility and Files
  - Fixed syncing issues with model visibility in older workshops.
  - XR admins can now share files directly to the table.

- Issues
  - Added 'Go-To Issue' Button in issue panel for workshop-related issues on exterior walls.

- Audio
  - Resolved audio echoing and cutting out in sessions with multiple users.

- UX
  - Fixed VR app crashes caused by low battery on hand controllers.

- Console
  - Console button now correctly opens in Workshop XR interface.
  - Resolved issues with console errors after headset idle time.
  - Fixed 'Something Went Wrong' message during panel switches.
  - Fixed disappearing controller pointers after 'go-to user' function.

Known Issues and Workarounds
- Files list may appear empty when creating a Workshop until a search is performed.
- Some users experience quieter audio levels after exiting and re-entering a workshop (resolved by app relaunch).
- Share to Workshop button may become unresponsive after headset wifi disconnection and reconnection.
- Console may incorrectly show Workshops under files tab after wifi reconnection.
- Users may be redirected to authentication screen when switching workshops after exiting.
- Non-3D file selection issue in WXR web app—files can only be viewed via files panel.
